properties.name: parent
properties.description: The object's container.

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: position
properties.description: The position of the top left corner of the text path.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the text path.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the text path.

properties.name: blendingMode
properties.description: The mode used when compositing an object.

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: The object's opacity (between 0.0 and 100.0)

properties.name: editable
properties.description: Can the text path be modified.

properties.name: top
properties.description: The top position of the text path.

properties.name: left
properties.description: The left position of the text path.

properties.name: closed
properties.description: Is this path closed?

properties.name: area
properties.description: The area of this path in square points.

properties.name: guides
properties.description: Is this path a guide object?

properties.name: filled
properties.description: Should the path be filled?

properties.name: fillColor
properties.description: Fill color.

properties.name: fillOverprint
properties.description: Will art beneath a filled object be overprinted?

properties.name: stroked
properties.description: Should the path be stroked?

properties.name: strokeColor
properties.description: Stroke color.

properties.name: strokeOverprint
properties.description: Will art beneath a stroked object be overprinted?

properties.name: strokeWidth
properties.description: Width of stroke.

properties.name: strokeDashes
properties.description: Dash lengths (set to {} for a solid line)

properties.name: strokeDashOffset
properties.description: The default distance into the dash pattern at which the pattern should be started.

properties.name: strokeCap
properties.description: Type of line capping.

properties.name: strokeJoin
properties.description: Type of joints.

properties.name: strokeMiterLimit
properties.description: Whether a join is mitered (pointed) or beveled (squared-off)

properties.name: clipping
properties.description: Should this be used as a clipping path?

properties.name: evenodd
properties.description: Should the even-odd rule be used to determine insideness?

properties.name: resolution
properties.description: The resolution of the path.

properties.name: note
properties.description: Note assigned to the path.

properties.name: selectedPathPoints
properties.description: All the selected points in the path.

properties.name: polarity
properties.description: The polarity the path.

methods.name: setEntirePath

parameters.name: pathPoints
parameters.description: Array of anchor values for the path points.

methods.description: Set the path using the provided array of anchor points.
